ai-atk-vin02a13:3_0: The Analysis of the monks is finished.
ai-atk-vin02a13:5_0: and then, when she is implemented, she wrapped in skin.
ai-atk-vin02a13:6_0: For a long time it was the true teaching,
ai-atk-vin02a13:7_0: May the king protect me from my teaching!
ai-atk-vin02a13:8_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis is finished.
ai-atk-vin02a13:9_0: Homage to that Blessed One, the perfected one, the fully awakened Buddha!
